Producer: 50 Cent, Andrew Deane, Randall Emmett, George Furla, Richard Jackson, Matthew Rhodes
Production Co: Mandalay Vision, LDMP, Emmett/Furla/Oasis Films, Industry Entertainment, Gosdom Entertainment, Movie Trailer House, Cheetah Vision, Boss Collaboration, Grindstone Entertainment Group, Envision Entertainment, Knightsbridge Entertainment, Paradox Entertainment
Synopsis: A firefighter does something unexpected after a man that he has been ordered to testify against threatens him.
Title: Fire With Fire
